problem: Navigation components used 'any' types and lacked performance optimization for real-time data.
cause: Legacy code patterns without proper TypeScript interfaces and missing memoization.

solution.phase1: Replaced all 'any' types with proper TypeScript interfaces
solution.phase2: Added useMemo for memoized real-time buildings data
solution.phase3: Created proper type definitions for pendingDeletionCompany and selectedUnit
solution.phase4: Optimized filtering with memoized computed values (filteredProjectBuildings)
solution.phase5: Applied enterprise TypeScript patterns across all navigation components

testing.typescriptVerification: All type checks pass - zero 'any' types
